text:
University of California | Application Developers | Irvine, CA | ONSITE www.uci.edu

The UC Irvine Office of Information Technology is looking for application developers.

We are a small, agile team that builds applications for offices on campus using the following stack:

ASP.NET MVC SQL Server jQuery

We have two positions to fill:

1-3 years experience https://staffing2.hr.uci.edu/CSS_External/CSSPage_Referred.a...

3+ years experience https://staffing2.hr.uci.edu/CSS_External/CSSPage_Referred.a...

We offer competitive benefits and great work-life balance.
